va-life-insurance-for-survivors.title: Veteran's Life Insurance for Surviving Beneficiaries
va-life-insurance-for-survivors.headline: Veteran's Life Insurance for Surviving Beneficiaries
va-life-insurance-for-survivors.summary: Financial payment from a veteran's or service member's life insurance policy may be available.
va-life-insurance-for-survivors.eligibil: The deceased served in the active military, naval, or air service.
discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
a member of the National Guard/Reserve
